circumstances: On short final to Spirit Lake-Lake Okoboji Airport, the left engine failed. The airplane lost height and struck the runway surface. Out of control, it veered off runway and collided with a fence, bursting into flames. The aircraft was destroyed and all six occupants were seriously injured.
probable_cause:
Powerplant failure for undetermined reasons. The following contributing factors were reported: 
- The pilot failed to follow approved procedures, 
- Improper emergency procedures, 
- The pilot failed to maintain flying speed, 
- Complete engine failure, 
- Propeller slash marks 21 inches apart, 
- Propeller not feathered.
